description: Lists the AI Guardrails available on the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: aiGuardrailSummaries
nested_items.description: The summaries of the AI Guardrails.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

nested_items.name: aiGuardrailId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: aiGuardrailArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: modifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time the AI Guardrail was last modified.

nested_items.name: visibilityStatus
nested_items.description: The visibility status of the AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the AI Guardrail.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. Use the value returned in the previous response in the next request to retrieve the next set of results.
